verses.kjv: Lord, who shall abide in thy tabernacle? who shall dwell in thy holy hill?
verses.ct: LORD, who is welcome to stay in your dwelling place? Who can live on your holy mountain?

verses.kjv: He that walketh uprightly, and worketh righteousness, and speaketh the truth in his heart.
verses.ct: The person who lives with integrity, who practices righteousness, and who speaks honestly from the heart.

verses.kjv: He that backbiteth not with his tongue, nor doeth evil to his neighbour, nor taketh up a reproach against his neighbour.
verses.ct: The one who doesn't slander others, who does no harm to a neighbor, and who doesn't spread insults about those around them.

verses.kjv: In whose eyes a vile person is contemned; but he honoureth them that fear the LORD. He that sweareth to his own hurt, and changeth not.
verses.ct: The one who looks down on those who are corrupt, but honors those who are wholeheartedly dedicated to the LORD. The one who keeps a promise even when it costs them, and doesn't back out.

verses.kjv: He that putteth not out his money to usury, nor taketh reward against the innocent. He that doeth these things shall never be moved.
verses.ct: The one who doesn't lend money and charge interest on it, and who refuses bribes against innocent people. Whoever does these things will stand firm forever.
